content.text:
# List of serving heads of state and government that have visited Russia during the Russian invasion of Ukraine

A number of foreign leaders have visited Russia during the invasion of Ukraine, meeting with the president of Russia, Vladimir Putin, and other officials, and visiting areas around the country. This list only includes heads of state and government that visited Russia while serving as the head of state or government.
List
Xi Jinping on March 21, 2023]]
Cyril Ramaphosa with Russian President Vladimir Putin in St. Petersburg on 17 June 2023]]
Kim Jong Un on September 13, 2023]]
Narendra Modi on July 8, 2024]]
Robert Fico meeting Russian president Vladimir Putin in the Moscow Kremlin, 22 December 2024]]
Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Moscow on 7 May 2025]]
Ahmed Al-Sharaa with Russian president Vladimir Putin in Moscow, 15 October 2025]]
